name: Accolite
description: Accolite is a best-in-class digital transformation services provider, working with Global 2000 clients amplifying new horizons of potential and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible for exponential success. Our combination of emerging technologies, proven processes, and deep expertise creates unlimited opportunities for growth and reinvention. Accolite offer innovative digital product engineering, cloud, DevOps, data & AI, customer experience and design services across banking, financial services, insurance, technology, media & telecom, healthcare, and logistics industries. We are committed to continuously improve quality, reliability and value for our customers while increasing efficiencies of our services through effective processes and adaptation of modern technology platforms.

Headline: Transforming the Future, Now

Highlights.name: ROADMAP EXECUTION AND ACCELERATION
Highlights.description: A clear, well-defined roadmap is the key to successfully building or modifying digital products. Expertise, experience, and a strategic approach are required to create a solution that meets your stakeholders’ vision and optimizes time and resources. That’s where our Roadmap Execution and Acceleration offers excel.

Highlights.name: M&A ENGINEERING  Creating a unified path
Highlights.description: Successful integration of multiple companies can be a high-stakes process even when the M&A process has been friendly. Our mergers and acquisitions engineering specialty focuses on bringing together disparate code, practices, processes and digital products, creating a single unified company.

Highlights.name: TECH DEBT ELIMINATION
Highlights.description: We pay attention to the ramifications those past technical decisions will have in the future, take preventative measures, and identify correctives as necessary so that your systems continue to work optimally.
